comment: /**  * A main method to start this application.  */
code: /**  * A main method to start this application.  */ public static void main(String[] args) {     SpringApplication.run(ClientApplication.class, args). }
@Bean public HystrixEventStreamServlet hystrixServlet() {     return new HystrixEventStreamServlet(). }
@Bean public ServletRegistrationBean servletRegistrationBean() {     return new ServletRegistrationBean(new HystrixEventStreamServlet(), "/hystrix.stream"). }
